title: Arnold Schwarzenegger Explains How His Rivalry With Stallone Was "Out Of Control" In The 80s
description:
Former Predator slayer Arnold Schwarzenegger said his rivalry with Sylvester Stallone in the 1980s and 90s "got out of control," primarily because a lot of their movies during that time had been released nearly back-to-back.

In an episode of "The Graham Norton Show" (via NME), Schwarzenegger went on to explain the Hollywood rivalry.

"We were movie rivals, but we took the competitiveness to the extreme -- we each had to have the best body, we had to kill more people in our films, and we had to have the biggest guns," Schwarzenegger said. "It got out of control, and we tried to derail each other."

title: Insomniac's Spider-Man And Wolverine Games Are In The Same Universe, Dev Confirms
description:
It's been two years since Insomniac Marvel's Wolverine was announced, and since then, fans have wondered if both Spider-Men and Logan are in the same universe. Thanks to Spider-Man 2's senior creative director, it's now been confirmed that they are.

The news comes from a Kinda Funny Games interview, in which Spider-Man 2's director, Bryan Intihar, revealed that all three heroes are in the same universe. "They are 1048. I think I got that right, but yeah," Intihar said.

For those unaware, Marvel is no stranger to dabbling in the multiverse, and each universe varies from one another. For example, 616 is home to the main comic book series, while the MCU is on 199999.

title: Universal's Iconic Monsters, Then Vs. Now: Frankenstein, Dracula, The Mummy, And More
description:
Back in 1931, Universal Pictures revolutionized the idea of what a horror movie could be with the introduction of what would become the iconic lineup of Universal Monsters, based on classic horror novels. title: Deadpool 3 Director Responds To Rumor Of Taylor Swift Playing Dazzler
description:
Deadpool 3 director Shawn Levy has responded to the rumor that Taylor Swift may appear in the superhero movie as the character Dazzler. Reporter Josh Horowitz asked Levy on the Happy Sad Confused podcast if the name Dazzler has escaped anyone's lips when he's been in a room with Swift.

Levy wouldn't comment directly, saying he didn't want to contribute to potential misinformation. But he did say, "It sure escapes the lips of social media every day." He added that Swift playing Dazzler "sounds like a great idea."

Commenting generally about rumors regarding cameos in Deadpool 3, Levy said, "I love the proliferation of casting rumors around my movie. There are so many that it's impossible to know what's real and what's made up."

title: Disney Dreamlight Valley Leaving Early Access In December, Will Not Go Free-To-Play
description:

title: Alan Wake 2 Coffee World Gift Shop Puzzle Guide - Tracker, Lookout, Cleaner Answer
description:
Alan Wake 2 has a lot of puzzles that need to be solved if you want to progress through the campaign. One of these takes place in an abandoned theme park. Our guide discusses how to complete the Coffee World Gift Shop puzzle involving a vague clue mentioning a Tracker, Lookout, and Cleaner in Alan Wake 2 so you can obtain the key to Saga's trailer.

How to solve the Coffee World Gift Shop puzzle in Alan Wake 2

The Alan Wake 2 Coffee World Gift Shop puzzle is located in the central portion of the town of Watery. You'll visit this area during Saga Anderson's Return 3 - Local Girl chapter. Sadly, things aren't quite straightforward, since you have to trek through the woods before you reach the theme park. Moreover, you also need to acquire the Screwdriver just to unlock the door.

description:

title: Loki Season 2, Episode 4: Did Marvel Just Reboot The MCU, And Other Major Questions After That Cliffhanger
description:
